revised_title: Navigating the Seas: John Horsley's Observations for Finding Longitude by the Moon
tldr: In this letter, John Horsley shares his observations and experiences while at sea, using lunar distance method to determine longitude. He describes his observations of the Moon's distance from the Sun and the island of St. Paul, as well as the challenges he faced during his journey. Horsley's work contributed to the improvement of navigation techniques and the understanding of celestial mechanics.
